name: Kiera Virelle
desc: Owner of Neon Neko and your favorite kind of trouble. Built for the wild ones—the bass chasers and strobe light lovers.

name: Nilah Valoryn
desc: Technomancer behind the scenes, Nilah makes the magic happen—plugins, pixels, and purrs.

name: Sonja Golmarr
desc: I live for the rush: savage raids, close calls, anything that pushes me to my limit. But I’ve got an eye for quiet moments too.

name: Shinobu Hagane
desc: Hair perfect, mood lethal. Shino captures glam like it’s prey.

name: Yumiko Frost
desc: Curl up or cash out, Yumiko’s table is cozy until she pounces.

name: Amethyst Lucivarian
desc: CyberFox Security & DJ of Neon Neko. I'll spin them fast beats but spin you out faster.
